January.meaning: Січень is the month at the peak of winter (сочень)

February.meaning: Лютий is the month when the weather turns furious (лютий)

March.meaning: Березень is the month when the birch (береза) blooms

April.meaning: Квітень is the month when many flowers begin to blossom (квітнути)

May.meaning: Травень is the month when the grass (трава) grows

June.meaning: Червень is the month when many red (червоний) fruits begin to ripen

July.meaning: Липень is the month when the linden (липа) trees bloom

August.meaning: Серпень is the month when farmers would harvest using a sickle (серп)

September.meaning: Вересень is the month when heather (верес) begins to bloom

October.meaning: Жовтень is the month when the leaves turn yellow (жовтий)

November.meaning: Листопад is the month when leaves (лист) fall (падати)

December.meaning: Грудень is the month when soil would freeze into lumps (грудки)
